item.description:
MLUSA members, Jean and Jim are hosting a mushroom hunt with the Boston Mychological Club at Endicott Park in Danvers on Sunday, August 21st. 2011 at 10:30 am. Endicott Park is located at 57 Forest St, Danvers. Off Rt.62.
Encicott Park is a beautiful 165 acre woodland. We have hunted there and found a vast variety of fungi.
Lets pray for great weather, and a fruitful hunt. Parking for Danvers residents is $1.00 per car. Non residents is $3.00.
Save the date, and hope to see you there!
item.name: Bring lunch, a basket for your mushrooms, and don't forget the bug spray!
